mapper.select: SELECT l.title, c.category_name, l.price, l.address, u.username, p.img FROM tb_lecture l JOIN tb_category c ON l.category_id = c.category_id JOIN tb_user u ON l.user_id = u.user_id JOIN tb_lecture_photo p ON p.lecture_id = l.lecture_id WHERE l.state = 1 AND p.is_thumbnail = 1;

SELECT l.lecture_id, l.title, c.category_name, l.price, l.address, b.business_name , RANK() OVER (ORDER BY l.created_at DESC) AS order_number, p.img,count(r.score) as reviewCount,round(avg(CASE WHEN r.score IS NULL THEN 0 END),1) as reviewScore FROM tb_lecture l LEFT JOIN tb_category c ON l.category_id = c.category_id LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON l.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN tb_lecture_photo p ON p.lecture_id= l.lecture_id LEFT JOIN tb_business b ON b.user_id= l.user_id LEFT JOIN tb_review r ON r.lecture_id= l.lecture_id LEFT JOIN tb_lecture_session s ON l.lecture_id = s.lecture_id WHERE p.is_thumbnail=1
AND REPLACE(l.title, ' ', '') LIKE '%${title}%'
AND c.category_name = #{categoryName}
AND l.price >= #{minPrice}
AND #{maxPrice} >= l.price
AND address LIKE '${location}%'
AND s.session_date BETWEEN #{date} AND DATE_ADD(#{date}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
GROUP BY l.lecture_id ORDER BY l.created_at DESC LIMIT #{startNum},12

SELECT lecture_id, title, category_name, price, address, business_name, img, count(score) as reviewCount,round(avg(CASE WHEN score IS NULL THEN 0 END),1) as reviewScore FROM ( SELECT l.lecture_id, l.title, c.category_name, l.price, l.address, b.business_name , RANK() OVER (ORDER BY l.created_at DESC) AS order_number, p.img, r.score FROM tb_lecture l LEFT JOIN tb_category c ON l.category_id = c.category_id LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON l.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN tb_lecture_photo p ON p.lecture_id= l.lecture_id LEFT JOIN tb_business b ON b.user_id= l.user_id LEFT JOIN tb_review r ON r.lecture_id= l.lecture_id WHERE p.is_thumbnail=1) AS a WHERE order_number <= 10 GROUP BY lecture_id;

SELECT l.lecture_id, l.title, c.category_name, l.price, l.address, b.business_name , RANK() OVER (ORDER BY l.created_at DESC) AS order_number, p.img,count(r.score) as reviewCount,round(avg(CASE WHEN r.score IS NULL THEN 0 END),1) as reviewScore FROM tb_lecture l JOIN tb_category c ON l.category_id = c.category_id JOIN tb_user u ON l.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN tb_lecture_photo p ON l.lecture_id= p.lecture_id LEFT JOIN tb_business b ON b.user_id= l.user_id LEFT JOIN tb_review r ON r.lecture_id= l.lecture_id WHERE l.state = 1 and p.is_thumbnail = 1 AND (l.latitude > #{qa} AND l.latitude < #{pa} ) AND (l.longitude > #{ha} AND l.longitude < #{oa} ) GROUP BY l.lecture_id

SELECT lecture_id, latitude, longitude FROM ( SELECT lecture_id, latitude, longitude , RANK() OVER (ORDER BY lecture_id DESC) AS order_number FROM tb_lecture WHERE state = 1 ) AS a WHERE order_number = 1;
